overview: Set against the heat of summer 2018 in Brooklyn, Zuzu battles with her artistic goals amidst an unexpected pregnancy. She receives little support from her roommate Lucia, who preoccupies herself with her midwestern love interest, Emily. A series of events and encounters with inspirational femme figures serve as a catalyst in deciding whether or not Zuzu will terminate her pregnancy and how she decides to proceed as an artist.
title: Poets Are the Destroyers
